meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lopsided.
meanings.sent1: The lopsidednesses of the cake made it challenging to decorate evenly.
meanings.sent2: The lopsidednesses of the building were evident in its slanted roof.
meanings.sent3: The lopsidednesses of the clown's hat added a comical touch to his performance.
meanings.sent4: The lopsidednesses of the team's strategy led to their defeat in the game.
meanings.sent5: The lopsidednesses of the tree's branches created a unique silhouette against the sky.
